On 10/30/05, ahmed_cs1985 <ahmed_cs1985@...> wrote:
> Im a new member=
 in this group. Im workning in a graduation project for
> developing a java=
 code coverage tool & I was wandering if someone can
> help me & give me so=
me names of books that can help me in the design
> of a java code coverage =
tool?

You might want to take a look at the source code for GroboUtils, EMM=
A,
and Cobertura. Those are all open source Java code coverage tools. All
o=
f the above tools rely on bytecode manipulation for instrumenting the
code =
with logging statements. There's also a commercial tool named
Cenqua Clover=
 which (the last time I looked) does the instrumentation
on source code ins=
tead.

-Lasse-
